column1: Uchi////The next 50% of item was the Pitchfork (makimono): Wagyu beef and avocado rolled up together
column3: with a side of yuzu kosho sauce. First of all
column4: when the fried leeks are absolutely to die for all by themselves
column5: you know that you are in for quite the experience. The Wagyu beef was incredibly tender
column7: and packed with amazing flavor. Then you add the rich and creamy avocado
column8: you get this beef texture and flavor that is unlike any other that I have ever experience.
